history.proof: intros X Y HX HY m Hincreasing. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote in *. hauto unfold: sepcon, UpwardsClosedSeparationAlgebra.

original: intros X Y HX HY m Hincreasing. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote in *. intros n1 n2 Hleq Hsepcon. unfold sepcon in *. destruct Hsepcon as [m1 [m2 [Hjoin [HXm1 HYm2]]]]. destruct Hjoin as [m1' [m2' Hjoin']]. exists m1', m2'. split. - exists n1, n2. split. + apply Hjoin'. + split. * apply HX. apply Hincreasing with m. ++ apply Hjoin'. ++ apply HXm1. * apply HY. apply Hincreasing with m. ++ apply Hjoin'. ++ apply HYm2. - split. + apply HXm1. + apply HYm2.
